LanguageData.Nex_WorkerOverclocked: Overclocked to <color=red>{0}</color> ops, current speed: <color=green>{1}</color> op/s. {2}GHz
LanguageData.Nex_SetPriority.desc: Higher priority means items are deposited preferentially
LanguageData.Nex_Overclocking.desc: Set the maximum overclocking level.\nWhen the network has idle computing power, it will attempt to consume 200% computing power to increase work speed by 50%
LanguageData.Nex_TransferItems.desc: Transfer items in this storage container to other available containers
LanguageData.Nex_AutoOrganize.desc: Automatically organize items in the network, filling from high priority downward.
LanguageData.Nex_NetPanelMass.desc: This data source only includes storage devices using weight units. It does not include capacities of other storage devices.
LanguageData.SearchDesc: Direct search: Search item names\nPrefix @: Search from the mod name the item belongs to. E.g.: "@core" \nPrefix #: Search from item descriptions
